welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Alzey, Germany! Get ready to experience the rich history, delicious wine, and friendly people of this enchanting city. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Alzey has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and expected to open in 2023, Terminal 3 will increase the airport's capacity by 25 million passengers per year.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour time limit per device.
